nodes.text: King Sethun was a male Sarkhai that was the leader of the Planet Sarkhai and the husband of the Queen Nyscha during the Cold War. Together with his wife, he was captured on the Waypoint Station Three by Augin Blaesus and Lord Kyrus, in an attempt to force his planet into submission to the Sith Empire. Their plot was foiled when the Barsen'thor arrived, and swiftly dispatched both Sith.
Sethun is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
